channel.title: Pimpscape help please
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]I need to know how to change the max level of stats because atm the max stats is 99 and i want to change it to 135 :)
Please help[/glow]
[shadow=red,left]Please send link of tut or something[/shadow] :(

item.title: Pimpscape help please
item.dc:creator: @ZenZei ZenZei
item.description:
@ZenZei wrote:

Purpose: Changes the max level very easily

Difficulty: 5

Assumed Knowledge: General Knowledge, and the xp which you have to work out.

Server Base: Cheezscape (Any)

Classes Modified: Client.java and Player.java

Ohk. Here is how to change max level
Step 1;
Open client.java and search for

Code:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }Step 2;
Change all the 135’s to the number you want max level, I’ve gone 200 on my server. Too make it be level 200 for every stat, change all the 135’s to 200, and the 300.0 to 400.0, so it should look like this.

Code:

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);			if (output >= exp) {				return lvl;			}		}		return 200;	}If there

has been a TuT on this, please tell me, and you will have full credits, I just found this in my client.java.

FOLLOW THIS TUT EXACTLY, BUT IN PLAYER.JAVA!

ALL CREDTS GO TO Yz85Racer

COPIED IT

Read full topic
